articles.author: Ana Diaz
articles.title: LilyPichu takes exclusive deal with YouTube
articles.description: LilyPichu is a popular streamer both on Twitch and YouTube and a member of the content creation group OfflineTV (OTV). On Thursday, she announced that she will exclusively stream on YouTube.
articles.content: Her streams will be hosted exclusively on YouTube starting Friday

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: RoboCop Rogue City is a new FPS coming next June, starring Peter Weller
articles.description: Nacon shows off first gameplay of RoboCop: Rogue City in a new trailer that also confirms a June 2023 release on Switch, PS5, Xbox Series X, and PC.
articles.content: Peter Weller reprises his role as RoboCop in Rogue City

articles.author: Toussaint Egan
articles.title: Cursed to Golf, Sea of Stars, and other new PlayStation indie game trailers
articles.description: Sony dropped new trailers and details for seven upcoming indie games coming soon PlayStation, including Cursed to Golf, The Tomorrow Children: Phoenix Edition, SCHiM, and Sea of Stars.
articles.content: Sony revealed several new trailers on Thursday for upcoming indie games coming to PlayStation consoles. Theres a wealth of great games and genuine surprises here, including Inscryption coming to Play… [+2359 chars]

articles.author: Cass Marshall
articles.title: Frustrated Red Dead Online fans get a pretty dire update from Rockstar
articles.description: Red Dead Online and GTA Online will both receive updates, according to an update from Rockstar Games — but Red Dead fans shouldn’t expect too much from new missions and releases.
articles.content: GTA Online and Red Dead Online are very similar in theory. Theyre both online multiplayer versions of Rockstars massive open worlds, set in a modern day San Andreas and the western frontier circa 189… [+2754 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Gilliam
articles.title: Vampire Survivors’ patch 0.8 adds the game’s final boss
articles.description: The latest Vampire Survivors patch is here and includes a new final boss, a new relic, and more. Here’s what’s been added in patch 0.8.
articles.content: Vampire Survivors, the $2.99 roguelite thats taken Steam by storm, is inching closer to being content complete. And with its new 0.8 patch, the game finally has an end boss to challenge longtime play… [+1165 chars]

articles.author: Matt Leone
articles.title: Inscryption is coming to PS4 and PS5 with exclusive controller features
articles.description: The expectation-defying card game heads to consoles, with PlayStation 4 and 5 versions of the way. No release date has been announced, but the ports will come with bonus features like in-controller voice and (on PS5) haptic feedback.
articles.content: Now with in-controller voice and haptic feedback

articles.author: Ryan Gilliam
articles.title: Elden Ring’s Let Me Solo Her player receives special, real-life sword
articles.description: Bandai Namco and From Software sent a special gift to the player behind Elden Ring’s legendary Let Me Solo Her account: a sword. The gift box is a congratulations for their 1,000th Malenia kill.
articles.content:
Elden Rings Let Me Solo Her saga has reached its natural conclusion: Bandai Namco and FromSoftware have sent the real player a real sword.
On Wednesday, Klein Tsuboi the person behind the infamous L… [+1706 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Gilliam
articles.title: Lego reveals $269 Mighty Bowser Lego Super Mario set coming in October
articles.description: Bower is getting his own gigantic Lego Super Mario set later this year. “The Mighty Bowser” set contains 2,807 pieces and allows players to move Bowser with special buttons on his back. The set is slated for release on Oct. 1.
articles.content:
Bowser, Marios longtime frenemy and the Mushroom Kingdom's handsomest antagonist, is getting a massive Lego set later this year. 
Lego will release The Mighty Bowser set on Oct. 1, and itll run buil… [+1423 chars]

articles.author: Oli Welsh
articles.title: Xbox will be at Gamescom 2022 with updates on announced games
articles.description: Microsoft has confirmed that it will attend the show in Germany with updates on titles that may include Forza Motorsport, Redfall and Starfield
articles.content:
Microsoft has confirmed that Xbox will be present at Gamescom 2022 in Germany in August, and said it will be focusing on providing updates on previously announced games.

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: E3 2023 in-person event, dates, and ReedPop partnership announced
articles.description: E3 will return to the Los Angeles Convention Center in June 2023, the ESA and producers ReedPop announced Thursday. ReedPop runs events like PAX, New York Comic Con, and Star Wars Celebration.
